TASK: Change desktop background
DOMAIN: settings

STEPS:
1. Click on the Start menu button to access Windows menu
   REASONING: The Start menu provides access to the Settings application needed to change the desktop background
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to open
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu animation to complete and display all options
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Click on the Settings icon in the Start menu
   REASONING: Settings app is required to access personalization options for changing the desktop background
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.08, y=0.88)

4. Wait for Settings application to launch
   REASONING: Allow time for the Settings window to fully load and render its interface
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

5. Click on "Personalization" in the Settings categories
   REASONING: Personalization section contains all customization options including desktop background settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.3, y=0.35)

6. Wait for Personalization page to load
   REASONING: Allow the personalization options to render completely before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

7. Click on "Background" option in the left sidebar
   REASONING: Background settings specifically control the desktop wallpaper and background image options
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.25)

8. Wait for Background settings to display
   REASONING: Ensure all background options and thumbnails are fully loaded
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

9. Click on the dropdown menu to select background type
   REASONING: The dropdown allows choosing between Picture, Solid color, or Slideshow as background options
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.6, y=0.25)

10. Select "Picture" option from the dropdown
    REASONING: Picture option allows setting a single image as the desktop background
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.6, y=0.3)

11. Click on "Browse photos" button to select a custom image
    REASONING: This opens the file explorer to choose a specific image file from the computer
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.6, y=0.4)

12. Wait for file explorer dialog to open
    REASONING: Allow time for the file browser window to appear and display folder contents
    ACTION: WAIT(1.5)

13. Navigate to and click on desired image file
    REASONING: Select the specific image that will become the new desktop background
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.5)

14. Click "Choose picture" button to confirm selection
    REASONING: Confirm the image selection and apply it as the desktop background
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.8, y=0.95)

15. Wait for background to be applied
    REASONING: Allow time for the system to process and display the new background image
    ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

16. Task completion
    REASONING: The desktop background has been successfully changed to the selected image
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The desktop background should now display the newly selected image. The change should be visible immediately on the desktop, and the Settings window will show the selected image as the current background in the preview area.
